## [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)

### Methods

|                                                                       Method                                                                        |                                                              Return type                                                               |                                                                            Brief description                                                                             |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [asBody()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asBody())                                                           | [Body](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body)                                                              | Returns the current element as a [Body](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body).                                                              |
| [asDate()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asDate())                                                           | [Date](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/date)                                                              | Returns the current element as a [Date](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/date).                                                              |
| [asEquation()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asEquation())                                                   | [Equation](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/equation)                                                      | Returns the current element as an [Equation](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/equation).                                                     |
| [asEquationFunction()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asEquationFunction())                                   | [EquationFunction](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/equation-function)                                     | Returns the current element as a [EquationFunction](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/equation-function).                                     |
| [asEquationFunctionArgumentSeparator()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asEquationFunctionArgumentSeparator()) | [EquationFunctionArgumentSeparator](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/equation-function-argument-separator) | Returns the current element as a [EquationFunctionArgumentSeparator](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/equation-function-argument-separator). |
| [asEquationSymbol()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asEquationSymbol())                                       | [EquationSymbol](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/equation-symbol)                                         | Returns the current element as a [EquationSymbol](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/equation-symbol).                                         |
| [asFooterSection()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asFooterSection())                                         | [FooterSection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section)                                           | Returns the current element as a [FooterSection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section).                                           |
| [asFootnote()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asFootnote())                                                   | [Footnote](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote)                                                      | Returns the current element as a [Footnote](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote).                                                      |
| [asFootnoteSection()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asFootnoteSection())                                     | [FootnoteSection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote-section)                                       | Returns the current element as a [FootnoteSection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote-section).                                       |
| [asHeaderSection()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asHeaderSection())                                         | [HeaderSection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/header-section)                                           | Returns the current element as a [HeaderSection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/header-section).                                           |
| [asHorizontalRule()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asHorizontalRule())                                       | [HorizontalRule](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/horizontal-rule)                                         | Returns the current element as a [HorizontalRule](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/horizontal-rule).                                         |
| [asInlineDrawing()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asInlineDrawing())                                         | [InlineDrawing](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-drawing)                                           | Returns the current element as a [InlineDrawing](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-drawing).                                           |
| [asInlineImage()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asInlineImage())                                             | [InlineImage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image)                                               | Returns the current element as a [InlineImage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image).                                               |
| [asListItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asListItem())                                                   | [ListItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item)                                                     | Returns the current element as a [ListItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item).                                                     |
| [asPageBreak()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asPageBreak())                                                 | [PageBreak](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/page-break)                                                   | Returns the current element as a [PageBreak](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/page-break).                                                   |
| [asParagraph()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asParagraph())                                                 | [Paragraph](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph)                                                    | Returns the current element as a [Paragraph](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph).                                                    |
| [asPerson()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asPerson())                                                       | [Person](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/person)                                                          | Returns the current element as a [Person](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/person).                                                          |
| [asRichLink()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asRichLink())                                                   | [RichLink](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/rich-link)                                                     | Returns the current element as a [RichLink](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/rich-link), for example, a link to a Google Sheets file.        |
| [asTable()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asTable())                                                         | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                                                            | Returns the current element as a [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table).                                                            |
| [asTableCell()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asTableCell())                                                 | [TableCell](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-cell)                                                   | Returns the current element as a [TableCell](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-cell).                                                   |
| [asTableOfContents()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asTableOfContents())                                     | [TableOfContents](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents)                                      | Returns the current element as a [TableOfContents](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents).                                      |
| [asTableRow()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asTableRow())                                                   | [TableRow](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-row)                                                     | Returns the current element as a [TableRow](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-row).                                                     |
| [asText()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#asText())                                                           | [Text](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text)                                                              | Returns the current element as a [Text](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text).                                                              |
| [copy()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#copy())                                                               | [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)                                                        | Returns a detached, deep copy of the current element.                                                                                                                    |
| [getAttributes()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#getAttributes())                                             | `Object`                                                                                                                               | Retrieves the element's attributes.                                                                                                                                      |
| [getNextSibling()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#getNextSibling())                                           | [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)                                                        | Retrieves the element's next sibling element.                                                                                                                            |
| [getParent()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#getParent())                                                     | [ContainerElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/container-element)                                     | Retrieves the element's parent element.                                                                                                                                  |
| [getPreviousSibling()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#getPreviousSibling())                                   | [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)                                                        | Retrieves the element's previous sibling element.                                                                                                                        |
| [getType()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#getType())                                                         | [ElementType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element-type)                                               | Retrieves the element's [ElementType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element-type).                                                        |
| [isAtDocumentEnd()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#isAtDocumentEnd())                                         | `Boolean`                                                                                                                              | Determines whether the element is at the end of the [Document](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document).                                   |
| [merge()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#merge())                                                             | [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)                                                        | Merges the element with the preceding sibling of the same type.                                                                                                          |
| [removeFromParent()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#removeFromParent())                                       | [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)                                                        | Removes the element from its parent.                                                                                                                                     |
| [setAttributes(attributes)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element#setAttributes(Object))                             | [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)                                                        | Sets the element's attributes.                                                                                                                                           |
